name: 10.4 "The Norm Who Came to Dinner" Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Cliff order for lunch?
questions.explanation:
Wing dings.

	Norm told him that he stared at the menu everyday but always ordered the wing dings. Cliff said he might want something different, but then he ordered the wing dings.

questions.text: What did Carla say Rebecca couldn't take care of?
questions.explanation:
Egg.

	Rebecca asked if she'd be a good mother and Carla told her "No." Carla bet $5 that Rebecca couldn't take care of an egg until Friday at closing time.

questions.text: What room did Frasier and Lilith ask Norm to paint?
questions.explanation:
living room.

	At first Norm said he was taking the week off because Vera was at her mother's.  But then, he agreed saying he could use the work.

questions.text: When Frasier kept on talking, who did Norm say he was beginning to miss?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Since Cliff was always talking, this was Norm's way to tell Frasier to be quiet.  Frasier was bored because he didn't have to work and Lilith didn't allow him to watch TV during the day.

questions.text: What TV station had Norm never heard of?
questions.explanation:
PBS.

	Fraiser was talking about the show "This Old House". When Norm asked what PBS was, Lilith said to Frasier, "Tell me you didn't see that from a mile away."

Norm.

	Norm told Frasier it was not safe to go on the top step of the ladder.  Frasier ignored him and then fell off the ladder.  He landed on Norm, thus injuring Norm's back.

questions.text: What did Woody say Cliff knew well?
questions.explanation:
Dewey Decimal System.

	Woody was questioning Cliff on different numbers. Cliff got them all right. The Dewey Decimal System is a way to categorize library books. Each genre can be found in a specific number for example English plays can be found in the 812.00 section.

questions.text: Who did Norm say he felt sorry for?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	He talked about how successful she was. Then he talked about how he just sat around at a bar all day. Then he said, "I don't know, I guess I've always felt sorry for you".

questions.text: Who was frustrated that people wouldn't leave his/her house?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Sam, Cliff, and later Paul and Phil all showed up the Cranes' house to hang out with Norm. Lilith put up with it for a while but then asked them to leave.

questions.text: Who first left the Cranes' house while everyone was still there?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm's back felt better so he went back to Cheers. Lilith was highly ticked off that the others were still there.
